page.title: 09TRAFFIC SURVEY CLOWNE
page.content:
THIS WAS UNDERTAKEN ON WEDNESDAY 10TH JULY FOR TWO HOURLY PERIODS.FIRST BETWEEN 9.30A.M.AND 10.30A.M. AND AGAIN 1.30P.M.AND 2.30P.M. ON MILL STREET THE MAIN SHOPPING STREET. 1.NUMBER OF VEHICLES HEADING NORTH TOWARDS WORKSOP,CRESWELL. 9.30-10.30 1.30-2.30 TOTAL CARS 101 114 215 LORRIES 16 8 24 VANS 22 22 44 BUSES 5 5 10 TOTAL 144 149 293
2.NUMBER OF VEHICLES HEADING SOUTH TOWARDS BOLSOVER AND MANSFIELD. 9.30-10.30 1.30-2.30 TOTAL CARS 86 107 143 LORRIES 4 10 14 VANS 16 19 35 BUSES 3 8 11 TOTAL 109 144 253
